import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Search =({changePages, search, dataSe, Reads, WantToRead, CurrentlyReading})=> { return (
search(e)} placeholder="Search by title or author"/>

{dataSe.length ===0 ? : CURRENTLY READING CATEGORY }

{/* I am going to search in CurrentlyReading and show the search results down here */}
    {CurrentlyReading.filter((data)=>(data.author.toLowerCase().includes(""+dataSe.toLowerCase()) || data.title.toLowerCase().includes(""+dataSe.toLowerCase()))).map((crData,crindex)=>( {dataSe.length!==0 ?
  1. {crData.title}
    {crData.author}
    2. :

    {/* No data to display if a user is not typing in search */}

    }     ))}

{dataSe.length ===0 ? : WANT TO READ CATEGORY }

{/* I am going to write similar codes for searching in Want to reads */}
    {WantToRead.filter((data)=>(data.author.toLowerCase().includes(""+dataSe.toLowerCase()) || data.title.toLowerCase().includes(""+dataSe.toLowerCase()))).map((crData,crindex)=>( {dataSe.length!==0 ?
  1. {crData.title}
    {crData.author}
    2. :

    {/* No data to display if a user is not typing in search */}

    }     ))}
{/* I am gon code search results for reads */}

{dataSe.length ===0 ? : WANT TO READ CATEGORY }

{/* I am going to write similar codes for searching in Want to reads */}
    {WantToRead.filter((data)=>(data.author.toLowerCase().includes(""+dataSe.toLowerCase()) || data.title.toLowerCase().includes(""+dataSe.toLowerCase()))).map((crData,crindex)=>( {dataSe.length!==0 ?
  1. {crData.title}
    {crData.author}
    2. :

    {/* No data to display if a user is not typing in search */}

    }     ))}
); } export default Search;
